High Priest Orven:
So, listen carefully.
First I'll tell you about hair accessories.
Hair accessories change your appearance. To enchant a hair accessory you need special enchanting scrolls.
They say, seeing once is better than hearing twice. So I've prepared Adventurer's Sheep Hat and Adventurer's Scroll: Enchant Hair Accessory for you. Use them and enchant equipment. It's easy.
Speak to me again when you've finished.
